author: gmazza
msg: 1.) Moved the CommandLineOptions' InputHandler object into FOUserAgent, allowing
for a no-parameter constructor for AWTRenderer (like the other renderers).  (Code is
not yet ideal in AWTRenderer, but will do the task.)
2.) AWT renderer handling now more similar to the other renderers
3.) Driver.getRenderer() removed from API.  (Renderer configuration now mostly
done through FOUserAgent, and setup of renderer prior to calling setRenderer().)
4.) Validity checking added to region-after, -start, -end, and -before.

author: gmazza
msg: 1.) Moving renderer-specific customization variables (producer, creator, create date) to FOUserAgent, those renderers which can work with these values can read them from passed-in FOUserAgent instance.

author: jeremias
msg: Disable check for maximum line length because of a problem reported in FOP 0.20.5.

author: gmazza
msg: 1. Moved renderer options to within FOUserAgent

author: gmazza
msg: 1.) Removed the get/setLogger methods from Driver, obsolete with Commons-Logging.
3.) Added a -v option to show version of FOP being used.
